   time  GNU grep  ripgrep  xs grep -j 1  xs grep  xs grep -j  \
0  Wall    13.280    2.710        12.122    3.158       1.644   
1   CPU    13.274    2.708        12.134   12.446      12.688   

   xs grep -j 1 --no-mmap  xs grep --no-mmap  xs grep -j --no-mmap  
0                  11.708              3.086                 1.858  
1                  13.886             13.972                15.190
